commit message: Massive Database Structure changes. Needs Testing!
Launch position Jumper on click on played time
Set priority of sleep timer higher
Simplified JumpToPosition to have it hide hours when not needed
Set singleline for spinner to false to have long text shown properly (like Name...........01)
Added proguard without obfusc to optimize performance
Loads sampled bitmap from internet to prevent outOfMemory

Completely reworked the file adding process.
Since the google image search api is deprecated and the new Api charges money,
internet requiring permissions are now gone. Also a way to change the book title
has been added.
Needs testing :)
Notification pending intent manipulates backstack to have better up-back navigation
Set intent flags to prevent FilesChoose to be in the backstack.
Fixed bug where progressbar wasnt shown properly
Readded cover search function because it still works
Have MediaAdapter Automatically downloading missing covers'
Preference added to skip file add dialog
Additional check to prevent rare crashes
Sets previous cover only visible if there are more than 1 cover
Finishes actionMode only when dialog has not been canceled
Stops Async Tasks at some times and improves network loading
Makes Async Task interrupted by closing stream
Fix for incorrect book init and prepare for prestissimo
Additional check for crash on init AudioBookPlayer
Back to old mediaplayer because Pretissimo is buggy
Now with draggable listView to sort the audiobooks
Adds accessibility description for changing book sort order
Prepare for next release and update build-tool etc
